comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: One of the things I love about this series is the happy faces on the subjects with few exceptions.  In many of the archives on the Commons the poses are formal and the faces severe, the change is very pleasant, thanks to Mr. Godby!

comment.author: 95711690@N03
comment._content: Everything that I have read about the Coal Branch, including what Allan Godby and his family wrote, indicates that it was a very lively series of communities.
